meanings.definition: The plural form of the noun 'sleep'
meanings.sent1: Many sleeps are needed for a good rest.
meanings.sent2: The sleeps of babies are often short and frequent.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sleeps seemed to last all day.
meanings.sent4: The sleeps of winter hibernation are deep and peaceful.
meanings.sent5: Counting the sleeps until the weekend helps pass the time.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of the verb 'sleep'
meanings.sent1: He sleeps soundly through the night.
meanings.sent2: She sleeps in on weekends to catch up on rest.
meanings.sent3: The dog sleeps on the couch when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: Time sleeps not, as it marches forward relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The city sleeps while the stars watch over in the night sky.
